title: Ozak AI's Quantum Leap in Crypto with $3.3M Presale Surge
description: Ozak AI has rapidly gained attention in the crypto market, raising over $3.3 million in its latest presale stage. The project's unique blend of artificial intelligence and blockchain appeals to investors seeking high returns. With strategic tokenomics and planned exchange listings, Ozak AI is poised for significant growth.
content: Ozak AI has swiftly captured the spotlight in the cryptocurrency market, recently raising a staggering $3.3 million in Stage 6 of its presale. Priced at an attractive $0.012, the project is capturing the imagination of investors hunting for the next ... [656 chars]

title: Nvidia to invest up to $100 billion in OpenAI, linking two artificial intelligence titans
description: The two companies signed a letter of intent to deploy at least 10 gigawatts of Nvidia systems for OpenAI and said they aim to finalize partnership details in the coming weeks.
content: At the same time, the investment gives OpenAI the cash and access it needs to buy advanced chips that are key to maintaining its dominance in an increasingly competitive landscape. Rivals of both companies may be concerned the partnership will underm... [4152 chars]

title: Powered Hybrid Platform for Content Marketing
description: Bangalore (Karnataka) [India], September 23: Clearly Blue Digital, Bangalore's well-known content marketing and knowledge services company, has launched a groundbreaking Human-Artificial Intelligence (AI) collaboration platform designed to solve the persistent challenges facing modern marketing teams. The Clear Owl platform uniquely combines automated AI content generation with oversight from professional human content specialists, eliminating the need for complex prompting skills while ensuring quality and accuracy.

title: Indian Man, Working At IBM, Gets US O-1 Visa After 3 H-1B Rejections: "Extraordinary Ability"
description: Tanush Sharanarthi attributed his O-1 visa approval to his exceptional work and research in artificial intelligence.
content: A 26-year-old Bengaluru techie, now working at IBM in California, shared his journey of getting an O-1 visa after being rejected thrice for an H-1B visa. In a LinkedIn post, Tanush Sharanarthi attributed his O-1 visa approval to his exceptional work ... [2406 chars]

title: Nvidia to invest up to $100 billion in OpenAI, linking two artificial intelligence titans
description: Nvidia's $100 billion investment in OpenAI signals a powerful partnership in the AI race, raising concerns over competition and potential monopolistic practices in the tech industry
content:
Nvidia will invest up to $100 billion in OpenAI and supply it with data center chips, the companies said on Monday, marking a tie-up between two of the highest-profile players in the global artificial intelligence race.

title: Nvidia to invest $100 billion in OpenAI, Sam Altman says compute is basis for future economy
description: Nvidia has agreed to invest up to $100 billion in OpenAI, a partnership that shows the growing demand for artificial intelligence infrastructure. The deal is expected to help OpenAI expand its computing power by building new data centres equipped with Nvidia’s advanced chips.
